query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `iot_ota_schedules` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `firmware_package_id` int NOT NULL,
  `target_device_ids` json NOT NULL,
  `target_group_ids` json,
  `schedule_type` enum('once','daily','weekly','monthly') DEFAULT 'once',
  `scheduled_time` varchar(5) NOT NULL,
  `scheduled_date` timestamp NULL,
  `days_of_week` json,
  `day_of_month` int,
  `off_peak_only` tinyint DEFAULT 1,
  `off_peak_start_time` varchar(5) DEFAULT '22:00',
  `off_peak_end_time` varchar(5) DEFAULT '06:00',
  `timezone` varchar(50) DEFAULT 'Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh',
  `max_concurrent_devices` int DEFAULT 10,
  `retry_on_failure` tinyint DEFAULT 1,
  `max_retries` int DEFAULT 3,
  `notify_before_minutes` int DEFAULT 30,
  `notify_channels` json,
  `status` enum('active','paused','completed','cancelled') DEFAULT 'active',
  `last_run_at` timestamp NULL,
  `next_run_at` timestamp NULL,
  `total_runs` int DEFAULT 0,
  `successful_runs` int DEFAULT 0,
  `failed_runs` int DEFAULT 0,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `idx_ota_schedule_firmware` (`firmware_package_id`),
  INDEX `idx_ota_schedule_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_ota_schedule_next_run` (`next_run_at`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `iot_ota_schedules` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,

  `off_peak_only` tinyint DEFAULT 1,
  `off_peak_start_time` varchar(5) DEFAULT '22:00',
  `off_peak_end_time` varchar(5) DEFAULT '06:00',
  `timezone` varchar(50) DEFAULT 'Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh',
  `max_concurrent_devices` int DEFAULT 10,
  `retry_on_failure` tinyint DEFAULT 1,
  `max_retries` int DEFAULT 3,
  `notify_before_minutes` int DEFAULT 30,
  `notify_channels` json,
  `status` enum('active','paused','completed','cancelled') DEFAULT 'active',
  `last_run_at` timestamp NULL,
  `next_run_at` timestamp NULL,
  `total_runs` int DEFAULT 0,
  `successful_runs` int DEFAULT 0,
  `failed_runs` int DEFAULT 0,
  `created_by` int,
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `idx_ota_schedule_firmware` (`firmware_package_id`),

);
